english.segment1: Holy One, Father of the Earth, Create in me a pure heart, So I can come in Spirit and in Truth. To worship You, That's what I long to do.
english.segment2: I love to Praise, I love to lift Your Holy Name!. From the rising of the sun, And going down of the same!. Your name is great!. I will bless You all my days!. Cause I love to Praise!
english.segment3: Righteous One, Lover of my soul. Age to age, forever still the same. Your name is like the sweetest melody!. Here with You is where I long to be.
english.segment4: I love to Praise, I love to lift Your Holy Name!. From the rising of the sun, And going down of the same!. Your name is great!. I will bless You all my days!. Cause I love to Praise!
english.segment5: You are Holy, My lips shall always speak Your praise. You are Worthy!. Forever I will always sing Your praise!
english.segment6: I love to Praise, I love to lift Your Holy Name!. From the rising of the sun, And going down of the same!. Your name is great!. I will bless You all my days!. Cause I love to Praise!
